title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for leading projects and delivering high quality and robust code for a variety of projects, including the development and integration of an NF-es and NFS-es issuance module, the construction of a dedicated system for user management and subscription signature plans, integrations with the IUGU and PlugNotas api and bank modeling

title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for planning, designing and building web applications for various clients.

title: Front-end Developer
description: I worked in collaboration with the front-end team responsible for the Watch Brasil platform website. I developed a video player using the KalturaPlayer base, as well as an electronic program guide (EPG) with real-time updates.
